anathema: Let your emotions dictate your tactics, hunt felines for sport, permit others of your rank or lower to calculate tactics on your behalf
edict: Study the art of warfare and strategy, strive to take and maintain control of your situation, hunt and slay hounds of Tindalos
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Suyuddha (The Warrior Queen)](/Deities.aspx?ID=621)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Study the art of warfare and strategy, strive to take and maintain control of your situation, hunt and slay hounds of Tindalos

**Anathema** Let your emotions dictate your tactics, hunt felines for sport, permit others of your rank or lower to calculate tactics on your behalf

**Area of Concern**
Battle, strategy, geometry

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Tekko-Kagi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=304)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=89), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=1603)

- **4th**
[Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724)

- **5th**
[Strange Geometry](/Spells.aspx?ID=2032)

</column>
name: Suyuddha (The Warrior Queen)
religious_symbol: Moon and bow with compass arrow
